title: Sherman Sure Is Shy
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 40 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 310L
description: Peacocks strut about with their tail feathers fanned out. Not Sherman-he is shy. Sherman Sure Is Shy allows students to explore how characters feel. Students can analyze characters as well as ask and answer questions in this sweet story. Detailed, supportive illustrations, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases support early-emergent readers.
reviewWords: fancy, grand, proud, shy, sure, wonderful
grammar: Complete Sentences                : Recognize and use complete sentences
